description.english: Caught the objects first time in Doerr Manor basement & in The Crow's Nest
description.german: Du hast gleich beim ersten Mal im Keller der Villa Doerr und im Crow’s Nest alle Objekte gefunden.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré du premier coup les objets au sous-sol du manoir des Doerr et au Crow’s Nest.
description.spanish: Has atrapado los objetos a la primera en el sótano de los Doerr y en The Crow's Nest.
description.tchinese: 在多爾公館地下室和烏鴉巢第一次就接住了物品
description.italian: Ho catturato gli oggetti per la prima volta nel seminterrato di Doerr Manor e nel Crow's Nest

description.schinese: 第一次在 Doerr Manor 地下室和 The Crow's Nest 抓到物品
description.russian: Впервые поймал объекты в подвале особняка Doerr и в Crow's Nest

description.polish: Złapane obiekty po raz pierwszy w piwnicy Doerr Manor i w The Crow's Nest
description.danish: Fangede genstandene første gang i Doerr Manor-kælderen og i The Crow's Nest
description.dutch: De objecten voor het eerst gevangen in de kelder van Doerr Manor en in The Crow's Nest
description.finnish: Hän nappasi esineet ensimmäistä kertaa Doerr Manorin kellarista ja Varispesästä
description.norwegian: Fanget gjenstandene første gang i Doerr Manor-kjeller og i The Crow's Nest
description.swedish: Fångade föremålen första gången i Doerr Manor-källaren och i The Crow's Nest
description.hungarian: A tárgyakat először a Doerr kastély pincéjében és a Crow's Nest
description.czech: Poprvé jsem chytil předměty v suterénu Doerr Manor & The Crow's Nest
description.romanian: Am prins obiectele prima dată în subsolul Doerr Manor și în Crow's Nest
description.turkish: Nesneleri ilk kez Doerr Manor bodrumunda ve The Crow's Nest'te yakaladım
description.arabic: لقد أمسكت بالأشياء لأول مرة في قبو Doerr Manor وفي The Crow's Nest
description.brazilian: Peguei os objetos pela primeira vez no porão da Doerr Manor e no The Crow's Nest
description.bulgarian: Хванахте обектите за първи път в Doerr мазето на имението и в Crow's Nest
description.greek: Έπιασα τα αντικείμενα για πρώτη φορά στο Doerr υπόγειο Manor & στο The Crow's Nest
description.ukrainian: Перший раз спіймав об’єкти в Doerr підвалі маєтку та в Crow's Nest
description.vietnamese: Bắt được các vật thể lần đầu tiên trong tầng hầm Manor Doerr & trong Crow's Nest
description.latam: Atrapé los objetos por primera vez en el sótano de la mansión Doerr y en The Crow's Nest
description.indonesian: Menangkap objek pertama kali di ruang bawah tanah Manor Doerr & di The Crow's Nest

description.english: Unlocked the shoe observation in every observation scene
description.german: Du hast die Schuhbeobachtung in jeder Beobachtungsszene freigeschaltet.
description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé l’examen des chaussures dans chaque scène d’observation.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado la observación de zapatos en todas las escenas de observación.
